altText: Image of couple in front of home in New Jersey that they sold with Chris James as their listing agent.
heading: Ms. Alli
text: I could not have made a better choice than choosing Chris James as my realtor. He has exceeded my expectations and provided incredible support in helping me purchase my first home. Chris is exceptionally patient and he consistently remained supportive, even when I felt discouraged. He worked tirelessly to help me secure the keys to my new home.
